meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unfavorable.
meanings.sent1: The unfavourablenesses of the storm caused damage to the crops.
meanings.sent2: Despite the unfavourablenesses, they managed to have a successful event.
meanings.sent3: The unfavourablenesses of the rainy weather made everyone stay indoors.
meanings.sent4: The unfavourablenesses of the situation cast a shadow over their plans.
meanings.sent5: The unfavourablenesses of the exam made it difficult for students to concentrate.

meanings.definition: Circumstances or conditions that are not favorable.
meanings.sent1: She faced many unfavourablenesses while trying to find a job.
meanings.sent2: The team overcame the unfavourablenesses and won the game.
meanings.sent3: The unfavourablenesses of the traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The unfavourablenesses of the economy affected businesses negatively.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with unfavourablenesses is a part of life that we must learn to navigate.
